flavor_text: またオラァ～ッNo.3！No.5を泣かせるんじゃあねェー?

flavor_text: ブチャラティ「S･F！」
ability: 【A】When this card's battle opponent becomes REVERSE, you may send this card to Memory. If you did, at the beginning of your next Draw Phase, choose 1 「S・F」 from your Memory, place it into any slot on Stage.
